sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app>
      <!-- Sidebar -->
      <v-navigation-drawer app v-model="drawer" clipped>
        <v-list dense>
          <v-list-item>
            <v-list-item-content>
              <v-list-item-title class="title">Salon Admin</v-list-item-title>
            </v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>
  
          <v-divider></v-divider>
  
          <v-list-item v-for="item in menuItems" :key="item.title" @click="navigateTo(item.route)">
            <v-list-item-icon>
              <v-icon>{{ item.icon }}</v-icon>
            </v-list-item-icon>
            <v-list-item-content>
              <v-list-item-title>{{ item.title }}</v-list-item-title>
            </v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-navigation-drawer>
  
      <!-- Header -->
      <v-app-bar app color="primary" dark>
        <v-btn icon @click="drawer = !drawer">
          <v-icon>mdi-menu</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
        <v-toolbar-title>Admin Dashboard</v-toolbar-title>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <v-btn @click="logout" color="secondary">Logout</v-btn>
      </v-app-bar>
  
      <!-- Main Content -->
      <v-main>
        <v-container>
          <v-row>
            <v-col v-for="card in cards" :key="card.title" cols="12" md="4">
              <v-card>
                <v-img :src="card.img" height="200px"></v-img>
                <v-card-title>{{ card.title }}</v-card-title>
                <v-card-actions>
                  <v-btn color="primary" @click="manage(card.route)">Manage</v-btn>
                </v-card-actions>
              </v-card>
            </v-col>
          </v-row>
        </v-container>
      </v-main>
    </v-app>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        drawer: false,
        menuItems: [
          { title: 'Dashboard', icon: 'mdi-home', route: '/dashboard' },
          { title: 'Services', icon: 'mdi-scissors', route: '/services' },
          { title: 'Staff', icon: 'mdi-account-group', route: '/staff' },
          { title: 'Appointments', icon: 'mdi-calendar-check', route: '/appointments' },
          { title: 'Clients', icon: 'mdi-account', route: '/clients' }
        ],
        cards: [
          { title: 'Manage Services', img: 'https://via.placeholder.com/200', route: '/services' },
          { title: 'Manage Staff', img: 'https://via.placeholder.com/200', route: '/staff' },
          { title: 'Appointments', img: 'https://via.placeholder.com/200', route: '/appointments' }
        ]
      };
    },
    methods: {
      navigateTo(route) {
        this.$router.push(route);
      },
      manage(route) {
        this.$router.push(route);
      },
      logout() {
        // Handle logout logic (e.g., clear session, token, etc.)
        this.$router.push('/login');
      }
    }
  };
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .title {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    font-weight: bold;
  }
  </style>
